meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively ambitious or having unrealistic goals.
meanings.sent1: Her overambitiousnesses led her to take on too many projects at once.
meanings.sent2: His overambitiousnesses often resulted in disappointment when his goals were not met.
meanings.sent3: Despite his overambitiousnesses, he still managed to achieve some of his dreams.
meanings.sent4: The overambitiousnesses of the young entrepreneur knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The overambitiousnesses of the plan made it destined for failure from the start.

meanings.definition: The state of having overly high expectations or aspirations.
meanings.sent1: Their overambitiousnesses in expecting immediate success left them feeling discouraged.
meanings.sent2: The team's overambitiousnesses in aiming for perfection caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The overambitiousnesses of the student thinking they could finish the assignment in an hour was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her overambitiousnesses reached such heights that even she couldn't keep up with her own expectations.
meanings.sent5: The overambitiousnesses of the company's growth plans were evident in their risky investments.
